snippet: To Hasbro, there is no one too young or too old to play with a Transformers robot, watch a Transformers television show or play a Transformers video game.
abstract: Toy makers like Hasbro are continuously tweaking and updating classic toy lines and their accompanying advertising campaigns to appeal to nostalgic adults who grew up playing with them; parents often look to favorites from their own childhoods when buying toys and games for their children.
lead_paragraph: To Hasbro, there is no one too young or too old to play with a Transformers robot, watch a Transformers television show or play a Transformers video game.
